Issue.creator: awjh-ibm
Issue.summary: Changelog script does not match new JIRA format
Issue.description: Formerly the Jira structure was that all fabric repos were components of fabric. Now that they are each their own project on Jira the changelog script should pick up on commits related to FABCAG rather than FAB. Since this repo is new and we have no commits tagged FAB we do not need to plan for handling the previous format
